texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: During a mentoring meeting today at work, my mentee asked me how I make time to write blog posts. I hadn't really thought about it before, so I joked that I needed to write a blog post on that. That's so meta.
texts.text: During a mentoring meeting today at work, my mentee asked me how I make time to write blog posts. I hadn't really thought about it before, so I joked that I needed to write a blog post on that. That's so meta.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: After thinking about it more, a blog post felt like a good idea. Let's get right to it.
texts.text: After thinking about it more, a blog post felt like a good idea. Let's get right to it.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Why write blog posts anyway?
texts.text: Why write blog posts anyway?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've written about writing[^meta_sorry] before, especially about why  technical people should write more often . Writing about things you know, things you love, and things you want other people to know has plenty of benefits:
texts.text: I've written about writing[^meta_sorry] before, especially about why  technical people should write more often . Writing about things you know, things you love, and things you want other people to know has plenty of benefits:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: It helps you structure your own thoughts about a topic
texts.text: It helps you structure your own thoughts about a topic

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Talking about a topic makes the knowledge more solid in your brain
texts.text: Talking about a topic makes the knowledge more solid in your brain

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You can link posts to people who want to know more about the topic
texts.text: You can link posts to people who want to know more about the topic

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Eventually people come along, read your posts, and they let you know about it
texts.text: Eventually people come along, read your posts, and they let you know about it

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If there's one thing that you should take away from this post, it's this: Write for you -- not for anyone else.
texts.text: If there's one thing that you should take away from this post, it's this: Write for you -- not for anyone else.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Here's what I mean by that. Write because it benefits you. Write because it makes you happy. Write because it helps you organize your thoughts. Write because you want to leave a small mark on the world when you're gone.[^40]
texts.text: Here's what I mean by that. Write because it benefits you. Write because it makes you happy. Write because it helps you organize your thoughts. Write because you want to leave a small mark on the world when you're gone.[^40]

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Sometimes I write a post and think  "Nobody will ever read this." I write it anyway.
texts.text: Sometimes I write a post and think  "Nobody will ever read this." I write it anyway.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: However, there are those times where you write something and a reader gains something from it. A tiny portion of those readers will send you something about the post. I use this as my fuel to keep going and it serves as a reminder that I'm doing something for myself that other people enjoy.
texts.text: However, there are those times where you write something and a reader gains something from it. A tiny portion of those readers will send you something about the post. I use this as my fuel to keep going and it serves as a reminder that I'm doing something for myself that other people enjoy.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: [^meta_sorry]: Sorry for going meta again. [^40]: I turned 40 today, so please forgive me for thinking about death. 🎂 😂
texts.text: [^meta_sorry]: Sorry for going meta again. [^40]: I turned 40 today, so please forgive me for thinking about death. 🎂 😂

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Structure is everything
texts.text: Structure is everything

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I try to follow a formula for most of my posts and it helps me organize my thoughts efficiently. Here's what I do:
texts.text: I try to follow a formula for most of my posts and it helps me organize my thoughts efficiently. Here's what I do:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Introduction:'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Introduction:'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Why:'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Why:'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='What:'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='What:'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Extras:'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Extras:'>]

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Eye of the beholder
texts.text: Eye of the beholder

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You may pass up a blog post opportunity because you think everyone knows enough on the topic already. You might do the same if a topic seems to complex.
texts.text: You may pass up a blog post opportunity because you think everyone knows enough on the topic already. You might do the same if a topic seems to complex.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My advice: write it anyway.
texts.text: My advice: write it anyway.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've written incredibly detailed posts about kerberos setups and silly simple posts about deleting a single iptables rule. They both get decent web traffic. They were both fun to write.
texts.text: I've written incredibly detailed posts about kerberos setups and silly simple posts about deleting a single iptables rule. They both get decent web traffic. They were both fun to write.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Learn from other writers
texts.text: Learn from other writers

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I read a lot of blogs regularly. Here are some I bloggers I really enjoy reading:
texts.text: I read a lot of blogs regularly. Here are some I bloggers I really enjoy reading:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Caleb Schoepp'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Caleb Schoepp'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Florian Haas'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Florian Haas'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Jacob Kaplan-Moss'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Jacob Kaplan-Moss'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Paul Kehrer'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Paul Kehrer'>]

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: When I read posts, I think about the topic in the post itself, but I also think about  how the author writes . I pick out one or two things I really enjoy from their writing and I begin adding those things to my writing habits.
texts.text: When I read posts, I think about the topic in the post itself, but I also think about  how the author writes . I pick out one or two things I really enjoy from their writing and I begin adding those things to my writing habits.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Some of these habits are complex. Others aren't.
texts.text: Some of these habits are complex. Others aren't.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: For example, Derek Sivers'  Writing One Sentence Per Line  post was incredibly helpful and simple. I've implemented it in my writing and it makes a huge difference.
texts.text: For example, Derek Sivers'  Writing One Sentence Per Line  post was incredibly helpful and simple. I've implemented it in my writing and it makes a huge difference.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: (Try writing one sentence per line. Trust me. It works.)
texts.text: (Try writing one sentence per line. Trust me. It works.)

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Over time, just like everything else, you will find ways to make your writing better while writing more efficiently. Avoid getting discouraged and always keep it fun. Write for you.
texts.text: Over time, just like everything else, you will find ways to make your writing better while writing more efficiently. Avoid getting discouraged and always keep it fun. Write for you.
